8.3 ORB runtime

8.3.2 Port assignment

Socket port numbers are assigned dynamically, by default. If you wish to use the original (1.2 version) fixed port number of the Functional Developer ORB, specify the following on the command line:

-ORBport orb

As of version 2.0, this port number is reserved for use by the Functional Developer ORB's Implementation Repository. However, you can still explicitly select a port number, for example:

-ORBport 9999
Developing Component Software with CORBA - 26 May 1999
